span.b: Harmony Public School will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year after theÂ State Department of Education authorized aÂ mandatory closure of all Oklahoma Public Schools in light of the continuing COVID-19 situation.Â Schools will continue with Distance Learning for the remainder of this schoolÂ year.
